amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that alternative fuel vehicles are eligible for consideration and use of funding under the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality (CMAQ) Improvement Program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to clarify that alternative fuel vehicles are eligible for consideration and use of funding under the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality (CMAQ) Improvement Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Ryan (OH) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Ryan (OH) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
